div.style: display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: flex-start
display: flex; text-align: right; white-space: nowrap; margin-right: 2px; margin-top: 4px; flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start
display: flex; line-height: 24px; background-color: @Color_Hue210_H1; border-radius: 17.5px; margin-top: 2px; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; position: relative

label.style: align-self: center; margin: 4px 8px; font-weight: normal; font-size: 24px; color: @Color_Text_Brand
